au.org.theark.gdmi.util
Interface IMarkerStorage

public interface IMarkerStorage

IMarkerStorage is an interface that should be implemented by a class to store marker data provided by the GWASImport processMap(..) method. The motivation is to separate GWASImport from the back-end storage method.

Author:
elam
